comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC,caption on negative is "Macedonian". en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HMS_Macedonian HMS Macedonian was a 38-gun frigate in the Royal Navy, launched in 1810, but later captured by the USS United States during the War of 1812.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  You are correct, the caption on the negative is "Macedonian."  We'll fix this next time we update.
